full_summary:
## Tender Announcement

### Title

Peplink Products or Equivalent

### Reference Number

SCC-22-00020792:T

### Amendment Number

2

### Solicitation Number

BPM017390/20792

### Publication Date

November 28, 2022

### Tender Closing Date

December 15, 2022, 3:00 PM EST

### Amendment Date

December 13, 2022

### Description

This procurement aims to acquire Peplink equipment or equivalent for establishing network communication between fixed and temporary locations. The requirement includes four modems/routers for temporary installation in aircraft hangars and trailers, and two additional firewalls/routers for central location termination of VPN connections. The selected devices must enable uninterrupted transport of UDP video, audio, and radar data streams.

### Areas of Opportunity

* Canada
* Worldwide

### Regions of Delivery

* Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)

### Contracting Entity

* Shared Services Canada
* 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1P 0B6

### Contact Information

* Librada Oliver
* Email: [oliver.librada@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:oliver.librada@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 343 542 8460
* Fax: 343 542 8460

### Attachment

Please access the tender description, terms and conditions, and related documents at the following link: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/...](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/...)

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) Trades`; admonishingثays
